info.name: Learning: Sobel Edge Detection
info.description:
A quick, late-night try at the Sobel operator. Once you understand convolution (and look at a few Shadertoy examples, hehe), it's not too bad.

Click on the gear icon for iChannel0 and set "Wrap" to "clamp" instead of "repeat" to get rid of white borders.
